start.text: Remain calm. I will be in charge here.
What great task shall I undertake now?

start_boss.text: What the hell is that? Is some kind of joke?

retreat.text: This is not acceptable! The filth will die for this!

engaged.text: Remain calm, while I shoot you.
No rush. You will all die!

pursuing.text: No need to be nervous. I am in charge.

running.text: If only they would use me as an example. Maybe then, this entire thing could improve.
I will take my leave now!

hull_90.text: This conversation no longer interests me. Shooting you interests me.

hull_50.text: This smell can't be good for me. Or anyone.
My training is not of use!

hull_30.text: This is the kindergarten of military training!
Drop everything! I require medical attention!

overload.text: What...? I must be given functional tools to do job!

victory.text: Obviously, I did not train them.
It was nothing. I teach people how to do this!
Well done! All enemies are ready for box.
